comments: Mrs. Loh Myers is a very kind person who will go out of her way to ensure that you are learning from her class. She really cares about her students and their education.

stu_tags: LOTS OF HOMEWORK  GET READY TO READ
comments: Don\'t do it! She\'s an awful instructor. My class didn\'t get our syllabus until 3 weeks into the course& even once we did, she was constantly moving around deadlines. I only JUST got back papers that I turned in almost 2 months ago&I still don\'t have a letter grade for the course. The class wouldn\'t be so stressful& difficult if she was organized.

comments: do not take. such a bad teacher. does not teach well. 100% confusing.gives a lot of homework. doesn\'t return essays back, so you do not know what you need to improve on till the end of the semester. shes so unorganized, doesn\'t post grades or assignments on black board. put the wrong book on syllabus. shes very upsetting and rude.

tag_professor: Tough Grader (2)  LOTS OF HOMEWORK (1)  Gives good feedback (1)  Caring (1)  Inspirational (1)  Get ready to read (1)
comments: She is a great person, but she doesn\'t explain things clearly. Says one thing and does another. Assigns essays but never returns them back for feedback so it\'s hard to know what the student can improve on. I do not recommend her.

tag_professor: Tough Grader (2)  LOTS OF HOMEWORK (1)  Gives good feedback (1)  Caring (1)  Inspirational (1)  Get ready to read (1)
comments: She is great as a person, but as a professor her teaching strategies are not helpful. She gets off subject a lot. She is very hard to please and if it\'s not her way then it\'s no way at all. I don\'t recommend her class. It\'s a premeditated F or D.

tag_professor: Tough Grader (2)  LOTS OF HOMEWORK (1)  Gives good feedback (1)  Caring (1)  Inspirational (1)  Get ready to read (1)
comments: This class is relatively easy if you do your readings and assignments BEFORE class. Teacher allows revision on essays and spends quality time on explanation of expectance in writings. Work load is fair;4 essays and 3 mid-terms. She prepares you for the final. A little disorganized but overall great teacher. She works WITH you. Thank you Ms. Myers!

tag_professor: Tough Grader (2)  LOTS OF HOMEWORK (1)  Gives good feedback (1)  Caring (1)  Inspirational (1)  Get ready to read (1)
comments: Profssor Myers is nice woman. However, her class is very challenging. She requires students to follow the syllabus, but she contradicts and adds assignments as she pleases. She wants details on everything. If you are not willing to give her details you may not pass her class.

tag_professor: Tough Grader (2)  LOTS OF HOMEWORK (1)  Gives good feedback (1)  Caring (1)  Inspirational (1)  Get ready to read (1)

comments: Susan Myers has a zero tolerance for late work but will contradict herself around mid terms. She ask questions and when answered if she doesnt like the way you phrase something she will rephrase it in her own terms. She is a tad bit annoying. Her assignments are great but she is a hard woman to like and get along with.
